variable.name: Gender
variable.description: Participant's gender as male or female [Male, Female]

variable.name: Primary Disease
variable.description: The main disease(s) for which the participant has been asked to donate a sample for study [Breast Cancer]

variable.name: Expression Subtype
variable.description: Expression subtype as determined by PAM50 classification [Unknown, Basal, HER2, Luminal A, Luminal B, Normal]

variable.name: Country
variable.description: Country where sample was collected [Mexico, Vietnam]

variable.name: HER 2 Positive
variable.description: Evidence of her2 protein expression on immunohistochemistry [Positive, Negative, Unknown]

variable.name: Menopausal Status
variable.description: Cessation of menses [Perimenopausal, Post Menopausal, Premenopausal, Unknown]

variable.name: Stage
variable.description: Pathological stage of breast cancer at diagnosis [I, II, III]

variable.name: ER Positive
variable.description: Evidence of estrogen receptor expression on immunohistochemistry [Positive, Negative, Unknown]

variable.name: Grade
variable.description: Degree of tumor differentiation as determined by pathology [I, II, III]

variable.name: Histology
variable.description: Subtype as determined by pathology [Carcinoma, Ductal In Situ (DCIS), Carcinoma, Mucinous, Infiltrating Ductal Carcinoma, Infiltrating Lobular Carcinoma, Infiltrating Tubular Carcinoma, Medullary Breast Carcinoma, Mixed carcinoma]

variable.name: PR Positive
variable.description: Evidence of progesterone receptor expression on immunohistochemistry [Positive, Negative, Unknown]
